overview:
Pierre is a French Internet veteran, who joined the online industry with Minitel services and technologies in the late 80s. Pierre then became head of marketing, communication and investors relations for Jet Multimedia, a key player Internet and mobile hosting provider listed on the Paris stock market. In charge of strategic marketing, corporate communication, press relations and investor relations, Pierre managed investor roadshows in France, UK, Europe and the US as well as capital increases (raising 100 M FRF in 1998, 65 M EUR in 2000), a takeover (friendly public offer from Telecom Italia on Jet MultimÃ©dia for more than 900 M EUR in cash in sep. 2000) private stock sale (30 M EUR of Jet Multimedia shares sold by LDCom in sep. 2003) and a dozen of M&A operations (acquisition of small companies by Jet Multimedia) during 10 years.
